ud5.3:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud5.3:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosi—
ud5.3:1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento nisinno hoti.
ud5.3:2.1_0: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī taṁ mahājanakāyaṁ dūratova sannipatitaṁ.
ud5.3:2.3_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhājīyati.
ud5.3:2.5_0: Appeva nāmettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā labheyyan”ti.
ud5.3:3.1_0: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī yena so mahājanakāyo tenupasaṅkami.
ud5.3:3.2_0: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṁ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṁ dhammaṁ desentaṁ nisinnaṁ.
ud5.3:3.4_0: “na kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhājīyati.
ud5.3:3.5_0: Samaṇo ayaṁ gotamo parisati dhammaṁ deseti.
ud5.3:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sabbāvantaṁ parisaṁ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi “ko nu kho idha bhabbo dhammaṁ viññātun”ti?
ud5.3:4.2_0: Addasā kho bhagavā suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ tassaṁ parisāyaṁ nisinnaṁ.
ud5.3:4.5_0: Suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ ārabbha anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
ud5.3:4.9_0: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ, atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—
ud5.3:4.11_0: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya;
ud5.3:4.12_0: evamevaṁ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
ud5.3:5.1_0: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthu sāsane uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud5.3:5.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.3:6.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya:
ud5.3:6.5_0: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
ud5.3:6.6_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
ud5.3:7.1_0: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
ud5.3:7.2_0: Atha kho acirapakkantaṁ suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi.
ud5.3:8.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
ud5.3:8.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
ud5.3:8.3_0: “yo so, bhante, suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito, so kālaṅkato.
ud5.3:9.4_0: Suppabuddho, bhikkhave, kuṭṭhī tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
ud5.3:10.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.3:10.2_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena suppabuddho kuṭṭhī ahosi—
ud5.3:11.1_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kuṭṭhī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe seṭṭhiputto ahosi.
ud5.3:11.2_0: So uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto addasa tagarasikhiṁ paccekabuddhaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya pavisantaṁ.
ud5.3:11.6_0: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccittha.
ud5.3:11.7_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imasmiṁyeva rājagahe kuṭṭhī ahosi manussadaliddo, manussakapaṇo, manussavarāko.
ud5.3:11.8_0: So tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ āgamma saddhaṁ samādiyi sīlaṁ samādiyi sutaṁ samādiyi cāgaṁ samādiyi paññaṁ samādiyi.
ud5.3:11.9_0: So tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ āgamma saddhaṁ samādiyitvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā sutaṁ samādiyitvā cāgaṁ samādiyitvā paññaṁ samādiyitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapanno devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sahabyataṁ.
ud5.3:11.10_0: So tattha aññe deve atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā cā”ti.
ud5.3:12.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
